product_name: JVC Adixxion Roll Bar Camera Mount
long_description: The JVC Adixxion roll bar camera mount quickly and securely attaches your JVC Adixxion camera (sold separately) to roll bars, pipes and rods. Mount is ideal for ATVs and fits pipes, rods and bars with diameters ranging from 21mm to 40mm.
short_description: The JVC Adixxion roll bar camera mount quickly and securely attaches your JVC Adixxion camera (sold separately) to roll bars, pipes and rods.
